title: Computation in Python
text: Using python, write a program to calculate the area of a triangle whose three sides measure 5, 6 and 7 units respectively. Your code should print the following output: 'The area of the triangle is ?', with the double representing the area your program calculates in place of the question mark holder.

test.code: This is the code the student should have typed in
test.output: The area of the triangle is 14.70
